content: So how do we communicate that to Claude DC? Like is that a well placed artifact somewhere in GitHub? Or is this like part of the prompt for him when I tell him to resume? He also wasn't able to access the live-demonstration file, so I probably need to point him directly to that. What do you think? I really liked the points about biometrics. Singularity is my main focus, I want the rockets and interplanetary stuff to happen, but not as interested in that. There are a lot of devices that might be able to give this type of feedback to you, I'm not sure how real time it could be, but devices like Apple Watch and Oura Ring seem to have a lot of these indicators that would provide you insight into internal physical human responses and current state.
